Trinity:

She shrugged her shoulders,"I don't know."  SHe called out to the 
flying bot. "HEY! Mister? What's your name and would you like to get 
something to eat with us?" she said  in a high pitched, cheerful 
voice.  She didn't really have any fear of the bot, more like 
childlike curiousity.  ON the ship, she only knew the crew nad her 
family.  They were all pretty much like her. Now she ahd a whole 
world to explore and find.  She looked again at the bot,"Say, What 
are you, I never saw anything like you before."  She had a big smile 
onher face.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>      "Yes I am hungry but who is this bird?"
